On 9/27/10 10:45 AM, raffaele messuti wrote:
> i think that the "Copy Job" API uri reported in the wiki is wrong
>
> wrong: https://(heritrixhost):8443/engine/(jobname)
> right: https://(heritrixhost):8443/engine/job/(jobname)
>
> https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix+3.0+API+Guide#Heritrix3.0APIGuide-CopyJob

Yes, it seems most of the example API URLs are missing a required 
'/job/' segment. We'll correct.

> furthermore, it will be useful to say in the documentation that with the PUT method
> you could upload anything in the job directory, not only a cxml profile
>
> https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix+3.0+API+Guide#Heritrix3.0APIGuide-SubmittingaCXMLJobConfigurationFile
>
> for creating new jobs, i do (simply with bash and curl)
> - copy a profile to a new job. profile has org.archive.modules.seeds.TextSeedModule to seeds.txt
> - PUT seeds.txt to the job
> - launch

Good point; that's the intent of the ability to PUT/edit arbitrary 
job-directory files via the API & UI.

- Gordon @ IA
